meanings.sent1: She wore the tressiest dress at the party.
meanings.sent2: The princess had the tressiest hair in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: Her tressiest hairstyle made her look like a fairy.
meanings.sent4: The tressiest tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The tressiest flower in the garden caught everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: The doll had the tressiest hair of all her toys.
meanings.sent2: The horse with the tressiest mane won the competition.
meanings.sent3: The tressiest wig at the costume party looked hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her tressiest braid was the envy of her friends.
meanings.sent5: The tressiest waterfall sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Most elegant or stylish in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She felt like the tressiest lady in her new gown.
meanings.sent2: The tressiest model walked confidently on the runway.
meanings.sent3: His tressiest suit made him stand out at the event.
meanings.sent4: The tressiest dancer moved gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The tressiest house on the street was a sight to behold.
